author: Jordan B Peterson
description:
This is a clip from our recent podcast with Jacob Howland. In it, he and Dr. Jordan B. Peterson discuss the finitude of the human race and how despite this, we grasp for the infinite. To illustrate this, they walk through various classic stories of immortality and it's speculative effects on man.

Unlock the ad-free experience of The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast and dive into exclusive bonus content on DailyWire+. Start watching now: http://dwpluspeterson.com/yt

title: The Immortal Who Sought Only Death | Jacob Howland
